main.name: Prashanth Adepu
main.bio: I enjoy developing applications ground up across domains. I have worked with companies through their lifecycles of mvp, bootstraped, funded and been part of more than 2 founding technology teams. Experienced working on rails, reactjs and firebase, heroku platforms.
main.contactmessage: Are you looking for Web Solutions for your problems. Get In Touch with me

resume.skillmessage: Been in a continuous process of learning and unlearning of technologies. I love full stack development and developed multiple live applications. Experienced working on multiple projects at a given point of time.
skillmessages: In a continuous process of learning and unlearning
Experienced in creating web solutions ground up

education.description: Passed out with a 9 GPA, with specialization in Data Science.

work.title: Founder
work.description: A technology services company. Onboarded clients, developed web applications ground up for clients from health, HR, Energy domains.

work.title: Technology Lead
work.description:
A caring, innovative digital therapeutics company focused on empowering individuals who struggle under the misguidance of one-size-fits-all health programs.
Part of developing team for client tracking dashboard, includes integrations of typeforms, sendgrid, mailchimp and shopify integrations. Also worked on third party integrations.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: A Reporting SAAS tool for Digital Marketing Agencies. Developed downloadable excel report based on users data from more than 10 third party marketing tools.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description:
Besthires.ai is a hiring platform using sophisticated machine learning to pinpoint best candidates for jobs. Best candidates are derived by individual personality, needs, values and past performance.
Developed complete web application with features like scraping data, user reports, third party integrations, a chat bot and integrated IBM Watson, data algorithms for user sentiment analysis

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: A market place for home services. Integrated third party delivery partners for continuous pickup/delivery.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: An operations driven Laundry management tool, with a potential of becoming a market place for home services. Part of Founding engineering team. Developed a laundry management system driven by operations for order creation, management, pickup and delivery of laundry.

testimonials.text: I have worked with Prashanth for over 3 1/2 years now on 2 significant and complex development efforts. He is always responsive, professional and thorough in his approach to coding, database design, UI/UX implementation and, most important, communication. His approach to a project is as a partner with a vested interest in its outcome and success for the client. I would not hesitate to recommend and use Prashanth on future projects.
